gov.sandia.cognition.learning.algorithm.clustering

Class MiniBatchKMeansClusterer.Builder<DataType extends Vector>

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.sandia.cognition.learning.algorithm.clustering.MiniBatchKMeansClusterer.Builder<DataType>
  • Type Parameters:
    DataType -
    Enclosing class:
    MiniBatchKMeansClusterer<DataType extends Vector>

    public static class MiniBatchKMeansClusterer.Builder<DataType extends Vector>
extends java.lang.Object
    Can be used to create custom MiniBatchKMeansClusterers without using the big constructor.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Builder(int numClusters)
      Create a mini-batch k-means clusterer builder and set it to the given number of clusters.
      Builder(int numClusters, Semimetric<? super Vector> metric)
      Create a mini-batch k-means clusterer builder and set it to the given number of clusters.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Builder

        public Builder(int numClusters)
        Create a mini-batch k-means clusterer builder and set it to the given number of clusters. Centroids will be initialized using a GreedyClusterInitializer.
        Parameters:
        numClusters -

      • Builder

        public Builder(int numClusters,
               Semimetric<? super Vector> metric)
        Create a mini-batch k-means clusterer builder and set it to the given number of clusters. Centroids will be initialized using a GreedyClusterInitializer, and the given metric will be used to measure all distances.
        Parameters:
        numClusters -
        metric - the semimetric to use to measure distances
